_header: When it was told to Jesu Christ
_description: Gospel for Friday after the Octave of Epiphany, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When it was tald to ihesu cristeÞat tane was Iohn þe baptist…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þus prechid criste þe puple vntillWalkand in erth als was his will
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum audisset ihesu crist quod iohannes.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia vi post octava Epiphanie secundum Marcum (rubric, f. 33ra)
